title: The passion of our blessed Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ: or, Cries of the Son of God Digested from the works of the late Reverend Dr. Horneck. Licens'd and enter'd according to order.
author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publisher: printed for S. Bates in Gilt-spur-street,
